text:
@SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe With all due respect Madam #Speaker, isn’t it time to seriously consider enacting the #25thAmendment after #Trump’s suggesting #InjectDisinfectant should be a #COVID19 
treatment? He is beyond unstable, he is #unfit. Please, #please #save our #country!
